demTra:
The crucifix has a 5m range, instead of 3m. 
 
The Demon can hunt every 20 seconds, smudging it will prevent it from hunting for 60 seconds. 
 
The Demon can chain hunt, making it really hard to get evidence at times.

Can Hunt at 70% Sanity, or any Sanity (See abilities)
demAbi: The Demon has a small chance to initiate a hunt at **any sanity.**
